name: Cluster memory usage
description: This PromQL query measures the memory usage of a cluster over a specific time range.
question: What is the total memory available in the cluster?

description: This PromQL query measures the memory usage of a cluster over a specific time range.
question: How much free memory is currently available in the cluster?

description: This PromQL query measures the memory usage of a cluster over a specific time range.
question: What is the percentage of memory used in the cluster?

name: Cluster CPU usage ($interval avg)
description: This PromQL query measures the average CPU usage of the cluster over a specific interval of time.
question: What is the average CPU usage of the cluster?

name: Cluster CPU usage ($interval avg)
description: This PromQL query measures the average CPU usage of the cluster over a specific interval of time.
question: Which nodes in the cluster are experiencing the highest CPU usage?

name: Cluster CPU usage ($interval avg)
description: This PromQL query measures the average CPU usage of the cluster over a specific interval of time.
question: How has the cluster CPU usage trend changed over the specified interval?

name: Cluster filesystem usage
description: The PromQL query measures the filesystem usage of a cluster by monitoring the amount of disk space being used across different filesystems.
question: What is the total size of filesystems in the cluster?

description: The PromQL query measures the filesystem usage of a cluster by monitoring the amount of disk space being used across different filesystems.
question: How much free space is available in the cluster filesystems?

question: What is the available space in the cluster filesystems?
